amendment.description: Amendment directs the National Coordinator for Health Information Technology to increase information and medical resources for individuals with low literacy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 109-603 to improve the availability of information and resources for individuals with low literacy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinojosa amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Hinojosa.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hinojosa amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
